contentrichtext.text: <!----------------------------------------------------------------------> <!-- From MoS:DAB: use ONE LINK per entry, SHORT descriptions. --> <!-- AVOID: piping links, external links, redlinks with little potential, full sentences, and references --> <!----------------------------------------------------------------------> {{Wiktionary}} {{TOC right}} '''Gent''' may refer to: * [[Gentleman]] (shortened form) * [[Ghent]], city in the Flemish region of Belgium * [[K.A.A. Gent]], football club of Belgium * [[Gent (hyperelastic model)]], rubber elasticity model * [[Gent (magazine)|''Gent'' (magazine)]], a men's magazine * [[Gentamicin]], an antibiotic * ''[[Gents]]'', 1997 novel by Warwick Collins ==People== ===first name=== *[[Gent Strazimiri]], Albanian politician ===last name=== *[[Chris Gent]], former CEO of Vodafone *[[Edward Gent]], Governor General of the Malayan Union * John Thomas Gent, founder of British clock makers, [[Gents' of Leicester]] * [[Thomas Gent]] (1693-1778), printer and author *[[Mike Gent]], musician *[[Peter Gent]], American writer and football player *[[Wade Gent]], American politician ==See also== *[[Van Gent (disambiguation)]] *[[Gente (disambiguation)]] *[[Ghent (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
